name: Skull Helm
description: When you suffer a severe head injury, the Skull Helm is destroyed. Archive this card.

name: Leather Mask
description: When you depart, gain +2 insanity.

name: Leather Bracers
description: When you depart, gain +2 survival.

name: Leather Boots
description: (puzzle green)(puzzle green) At the end of your act, you may move 1 space.

name: Rawhide Boots
description: When you depart, gain +1 survival.

name: Rawhide Gloves
description: When you depart, gain +1 survival.

name: Rawhide Headband
description: (puzzle blue)(flash): Reveal the top 2 (AI). Place them back on top of the deck in any order

name: Rawhide Vest
description: (puzzle blue)(puzzle red) +1 evasion

name: Lion Headdress
description: Accessory: You may wear this in addition to 1 armor at this hit location.

name: Lion Skin Cloak
description: Reduce damage from every hit suffered by 1, to a minimum of 1.

name: White Lion Gauntlet
description: When you Pounce, gain +1 accuracy for your next attack this turn.

name: White Lion Coat
description: Pounce: Spend (horse) and (flash) to move 3 spaces in a straight line. Then, if you move 3 spaces, activate a melee weapon with +1 strength.

name: White Lion Boots
description: (puzzle red)(puzzle red) +1 movement

name: White Lion Helm
description: (puzzle red)(square blue) (flash) and 1 survival: Road. Non-Deaf Insane survivors gain +2 strength until end of round. All other survivors gain +1 insanity.

name: Cloth
description: The Cloth protects your waist. Gain 1 armor point at the waist hit location.

name: Oxidized Lantern Helm
description: Outfit. (puzzle blue)(square red) If you are not deaf, you may ignore effects that target non-deaf survivors.

name: Death Mask
description: Unique, Irreplaceable, Accessory. If you have no affinities, gain +4 luck and suffer -4 to all severe injury rolls.

name: Man Mask
description: Unique, Irreplaceable, Accessory. (square red)(square green) If insane, you may spend negative attribute tokens in place of survival.

name: God Mask
description: Unique, Irreplaceable, Accessory. (square red)(square red)(square green)(square green)(square blue)(square blue) At the start of your act, if insane, gain +1 survival.

name: White Lion Mask
description: Unique, Irreplaceable, Accessory. (square green)(square green) If insane, spend (flash) to lose all your survival and gain that many +1 strength tokens.

name: Phoenix Mask
description: Unique, Irreplaceable, Accessory. (square red)(square red)(square red)(square red) If insane, you may dodge 1 additional time per round.

name: Antelope Mask
description: Unique, Irreplaceable, Accessory. (square red)(square red)(square blue)(square blue) At the start of your act, if insane, gain +1(horse).

name: Forsaker Mask
description: Unique, Irreplaceable, Accessory. During the Aftermath, you run off into the darkness never to be seen again. During the Settlement Phase, you may archive this item to build the Mask Maker location.

name: Regal Gauntlet
description: Cursed. At the Aftermath, (milestone) King's Curse.

name: Regal Plackart
description: Cursed. At the Aftermath, (milestone) King's Curse.

name: Regal Greaves
description: Cursed. At the Aftermath, (milestone) King's Curse.

name: Regal Helm
description: Cursed. At the Aftermath, (milestone) King's Curse.

name: Regal Faulds
description: Cursed. At the Aftermath, (milestone) King's Curse.

name: Lantern Greaves
description: (puzzle red)(puzzle red)(puzzle blue) +2 Movement

name: Lantern Cuirass
description: -2 movement. (puzzle blue)(puzzle green)(puzzle green)(puzzle blue) When you depart, add (shieldthree) to all hit locations with metal armor.

name: Lantern Gauntlets
description: (puzzle green) +2 Accuracy with club weapons.

name: Lantern Helm
description: (puzzle blue) Ear plugs. You are deaf. -1 accuracy.

name: Screaming Bracers
description: On Arrival, if possible, add an Acanthus Plant terrain card to the showdown. When you activate terrain, you may add +2 to your roll result.

name: Screaming Coat
description: Slam: Spend (horse) to full move forward in a straight line. If you move 4+ spaces and stop adjacent to a monster, it suffers knockback 1 and -1 toughness until the end of the round.

name: Screaming Horns
description: (flash): Scream. Non-deaf insane survivors gain +1 movement until end of round. All other survivors gain +1 insanity.

name: Screaming Skirt
description: Thick, protective fur protects your parts. Add +1 to severe waist injury roll results.

name: Screaming Leg Warmers
description: On Arrival your feet hurt, gain +3 insanity.

name: Phoenix Helm
description: (puzzle blue)(square green)(square red) If insane at the start of the showdown, gain +1 evasion token.

name: Phoenix Faulds
description: When you depart, gain +1 insanity.

name: Phoenix Plackart
description: (puzzle blue)(puzzle green)(puzzle red) If insane, ignore the first hit each round and suffer 1 brain damage instead.

name: Phoenix Greaves
description: If insane, gain +2 movement.

name: Phoenix Gauntlet
description: When you depart, gain +1 insanity.
